forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the early hours of this tranquil morning, Downtown San Francisco breathes in a gentle veil of mostly cloudy skies, the atmosphere hinting at a gradual warming as the night surrenders to a subtle dawn. With a cool breeze from the west-southwest caressing the streets, residents are greeted by a low lingering around 56 degrees, an appropriate embrace for those wrapped in light layers. As the day unfolds, the sun is set to break through, chasing away the clouds, and ushering in a pleasant warmth reaching towards the high 60s. The west wind, with its playful gusts, will add a spirited refreshment to the daylight, painting the city in crisp blues and golden hues.

Though the remnants of the marine layer will likely hover in the corners of the city, masking some of the familiar landmarks in an enigmatic shroud, it’s a perfect day for a stroll along the waterfront or through the gardens of Golden Gate Park, where the invigorating air encourages a quiet appreciation of nature’s calm. Comfortable, layered clothing will serve well, allowing for a gentle transition from the fresh morning air to the brighter, mild afternoon. One might find joy in simple moments—perhaps enjoying a cup of coffee at an outdoor café or meandering through local shops, as the clear skies promise a picturesque backdrop for a leisurely day.
